creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: line drawing of winged elf wearing cap, mittens and scarf seated on a snow-covered branch; text in reverse below: "MERRY CHRISTMAS / THE HOLZSCHUHS"
inscription:
Inscription

URC, in black ink: [M]; LRC, on back, in pencil: [18]
medium: Pen and ink and graphite on card
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Jim Hogan, Hudson, WI.
title: Christmas card illustration with winged elf on branch (in reverse)
